AbilityDef.label: rampant regeneration
AbilityDef.description: Inject some radioactive energy into a pawn's blood to cause them to start recovering from wounds at an unbelievable pace. Even lost parts can start regrowing while in this state. Unfortunately, this comes with an extreme risk that some of their cells will be negatively affected by the radioactive energy, resulting in carcinoma.\n\nDue to the nature of this ability, it will not work on other radiomancers as their body will just attempt to absorb the radiation, and fail due to its characteristics.

AbilityDef.label: miniature sun
AbilityDef.description: Create an exceptionally small star that lets out a massive amount of heat and light. This star will be stable for about a day before the safety measures within it force the energy to dissipate.

AbilityDef.label: excitable cells
AbilityDef.description: Inject some radioactive energy into a pawn's blood to cause them to start recovering from infections at an unbelievable pace due to the energy that was injected into their body. Unfortunately, this comes with an notable risk that some of their cells will be negatively affected by the radioactive energy.\n\nDue to the nature of this ability, it will not work on other radiomancers as their body will just attempt to absorb the radiation, and fail due to its characteristics.

AbilityDef.label: ever evolving
AbilityDef.description:
Use a large amount of radiation to permanently alter this pawn's somatic cells. This has two effects on the pawn.

First, it gives them progress on the ever evolving (foodless) hediff, which reduces the pawn's food need up a 99% reduction if 100% progress is reached. This bonus remains even if the pawn has their genes completely changed, but it takes an extremely long time to reach even if you use this ability every six days.

The second, and more immediate, change is that the pawn attempts to gain any of the other Radiomancer genes. The chance of this succeeding goes down as they gain more Radiomancer genes, and genes gained through this ability can't be inherited, though they can be extracted.

AbilityDef.label: mutate
AbilityDef.description:
Use a small amount of radiation to forcefully trigger a genetic super mutation. This ability allows the radiomancer to gain a mutation even if they do not have the superhero base gene. If they have no mutation when this ability is activated, they are given a completely random one, and if they do have a mutation they have an extremely high chance (over 90%) to have that mutation changed into another one.

There are two risks with this ability. First, there is no way to control what mutation the pawn gains, so it may be one that is counterproductive for what the pawn is intended to do. The second risk is that the selected mutation may cause some of the pawn's current genes to become temporarily inactive until the mutation is gone. Much like mutations themselves, there are advantages and disadvantages associated with this effect.

Note that if you have multiple mutations active in the settings and active on this pawn, only one mutation will be created through this ability, meaning the other ones will simply vanish.

AbilityDef.label: reform part
AbilityDef.description: Focus a bunch of radiation on the cells in an area to cause rapid cellular reconstruction of a missing part. This ability may be interrupted if the Radiomancer takes damage while regrowing the part, and things like fingers will require special attention to avoid accidental malformation. This can regrow eyes even if you have the blindsight precept, though something like scaring will not be removed by this ability.

AbilityDef.label: reverse aging
AbilityDef.description: Apply a small amount of radiation on another pawn to rejuvenate internal parts, reducing the pawn's biological age by a year. Due to the nature of this ability, it can't reduce the age of a pawn below 18 years old, and can't help much to get rid of chronic ailments.

AbilityDef.label: refocus energy (wake)
AbilityDef.description: Convert radioactive energy into an internal pocket of energy that refreshes the body to avoid some of the physical effects of staying up a long time.

AbilityDef.label: refocus energy (sleepy)
AbilityDef.description: Convert the body's internal reserves of energy into radioactive energy. Pawn's with the never sleep gene can use this without reprecussion.
